title: Sar Mashhad
description: Sar Mashhad, located in the Dadin Rural District, Jereh and Baladeh District, Kazerun County, Fars Province, Iran, is the site of a Sasanian rock relief of a lion hunt, along with accompanying inscriptions. The monument dates to the reign of the king Bahram II (r. 274â€“293 CE).

properties.description: Representative point location digitized from the Barrington Atlas of the Greek and Roman World by the Digital Atlas of Roman and Medieval Civilizations project at Harvard University.
properties.title: DARMC location 22333
